name: amp-acp
description: ACP adapter that bridges Amp Code to Agent Client Protocol (Zed external agent)

scripts.build:binary: bun build src/index.ts --target=node --outdir=dist --entry-naming=[dir]/[name].js && bun build dist/index.js --compile --outfile dist/amp-acp
scripts.test:binary: bun build src/index.ts --target=node --outdir=dist --entry-naming=[dir]/[name].js && bun build dist/index.js --compile --outfile dist/amp-acp-test && bun test test/binary.test.ts
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:binary
